entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 p.m. ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
